task.title: Installing the Installation Manager via Command Line
task.shortdesc: You can perform a silent installation with the help of instructions provided here.

taskbody.prereq:
To perform a silent installation you must need a file.
During silent installation of IBM Security Directory Integrator on UNIX systems, ensure that the service name for IBMÂ® Security Directory Integrator and AMC does not exceed the maximum length of 4 characters.

context.p: Follow the steps below for a silent installation:

step.cmd: Open the IBM Power Shell and enter the following syntax:

taskbody.result: You should a get similar result.tdisrv_silent must be 4 characters or less. A service already exists with that name or the name is invalid. UNIX based platforms, maximum 4 characters name is valid.

tasktroubleshooting.p: If there is any errors, you must edit the response file and change the values of the TDI_SERVER_SERVICENAME and TDI_AMC_SERVICENAME properties to be 4 characters or less.
